SEARCH
Package com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.vehicle

Class HeavyVehicle

java.lang.Object
com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.vehicle.Vehicle
com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.vehicle.HeavyVehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Assignable, Calculable, Maintainable, Reportable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bus, Truck
public abstract class HeavyVehicle extends Vehicle
Abstract intermediate class for heavy vehicles (trucks, buses).

OOP concept – Hierarchy (Inheritance): HeavyVehicle extends Vehicle adding weight-related attributes, and is further specialised by Truck and Bus. This creates a three-level inheritance chain: Vehicle → HeavyVehicle → Truck/Bus.

OOP concept – Upcasting: a Truck or Bus can be referenced as a HeavyVehicle or Vehicle, allowing polymorphic behaviour.

OOP concept – Downcasting: Fleet.getVehiclesRequiringCommercialLicense() downcasts Vehicle references to HeavyVehicle using instanceof to access requiresCommercialLicense().

See Also:
  • Truck
  • Bus

    • HeavyVehicle

      public HeavyVehicle(long id, String licensePlate, String make, String model, int year, double mileage, double grossVehicleWeight)
      Creates a heavy vehicle.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier
      licensePlate - licence plate
      make - manufacturer
      model - model name
      year - manufacturing year
      mileage - total kilometres
      grossVehicleWeight - gross weight in tons (≥ 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is invalid

      Throws:

    • requiresCommercialLicense

      public boolean requiresCommercialLicense()
      Determines whether this vehicle exceeds the 3.5-ton threshold that requires a commercial driving licence.
      Returns:
      true if grossVehicleWeight > 3.5
